contents: Article 9 (Evaluation Team) ① The Committee may establish an evaluation team to efficiently carry out evaluation-related work. Revised on April 3, 2017. ② The head of the evaluation team is determined by the chairman from among the committee members upon the recommendation of the chairperson, and matters related to the composition and operation of the evaluation group are subject to the evaluation work guidelines established after deliberation by the committee every year. Revised on January 31, 2019, November 5, 2020. ③ The evaluation team may present opinions to the committee regarding the following matters. Revised 2020. 11. 5. 1. Operation and improvement of the evaluation system, preparation of evaluation work guidelines and evaluation indicators 2. Confirmation and inspection of evaluation results, implementation of re-evaluation 3. Other matters necessary for evaluation operation
